newsitem.title: USA: Dr Solomon's launches N. American seminars.
newsitem.headline: Dr Solomon's launches N. American seminars.

text.p: Dr Solomon's Group PLc said Tuesday its live virus workshop seminars will be launched in North America in September.
The company said the seminars instruct attendees on virus prevention and recovery tactics using live computer viruses.
The first workshop will be held in Dedham, Mass, followed by workshops in additional locations throughout North America.
Registration for the two-day seminar is $995.
The company said the live virus workshops originated in the U.K.
Dr Solomon's Group is a U.K. producer of anti-virus sortware for personal computers and networks.
